text.garnishedstoneautomation.heat_sourc: Examples: Magma Block, Lava, Lava filled Cauldron
advancement.garnishedstoneautomation.mec: Utilize a Mechanical Extractor to heat up your materials

garnishedstoneautomation.ponder.processi: Processing Items in the Mechanical Extractor
garnishedstoneautomation.ponder.intro.te: The Mechanical Extractor requires a heat source to be placed underneath in order to function or to pick up any items
It can only be powered by cogs - similar to the Mechanical Mixer or Mechanical Crafter - and cannot be powered from the bottom... Surprising
garnishedstoneautomation.ponder.processi: Mechanical Extractors can be used to make Vehement Clusters
Throw or Insert items at the top (or from the sides with funnels)
After some time, the result can be obtained via Right-click
The outputs can also be extracted by automation
Vehement Clusters can be used to automate certain stones - such as Asurine or Veridium
Deploying a Vehement Cluster onto a piece of any stone (granite, diorite, stone, etc.) 9 times will provide you with a given stone type from the Create mod
